CustomField.description: "A ""Major Event"" is a catastrophe, disaster, or other series of related incidents over a wide geographic area which have a widespread impact on many different entities, e.g. a large earthquake or hurricane, an epidemic, a series of wildfires over the course of a season.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: "A ""Major Event"" is a catastrophe, disaster, or other series of related incidents over a wide geographic area which have a widespread impact on many different entities, e.g. a large earthquake or hurricane, an epidemic, over the course of a season.
CustomField.label: Major Event
